author: Anon Anon
comment: Wont download to watch and doesnt appear in my apps on phone unless I search app manager. Bought it twice now and still doesnt work.

author: mike lotus
comment: Looks great on watch, I wish there was a little more customization for colors and tap feature but overall great !! Thanks
title: Great watch face !!!

author: Paul Jeynes
comment: Straightforward but great looking on my Huawei.  Less is more.
title: Looks Great

author: John Bowdre
comment: Absolutely gorgeous face.  The detail and clarity of the visual elements is incredible, and the expert use of shadow effects really lends a powerful sense of depth to this face. This is one of the more realistic faces I've encountered, and I've tried a lot. The dev is also very responsive to feedback and was very quick to implement a toggle for the bezel at my request. Thanks!

reply.author: FT Games Studio
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. Thumbs up!

author: William Johnson
comment: I don't know if it's an optical illusion or a problem, but the watch face looks slightly off-kilter on the LG urbane.

reply.author: FT Games Studio
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback William Johnson. Sorry for the inconvencience, I'll make some more tests on LG Urbane to see whats happening!

title: Looks fairly good on the urbane...
